alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 1:58AM CDT until June 18 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 157 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Cave Springs to 2 miles west of Strickler, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Lincoln... Greenland... Cincinnati... Drake Field Airport... Goshen... Prairie Grove Battlefield State... Walnut Grove... Tuttle... Sulphur City... Rhea... Summers... Viney Grove... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 53 and 64. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
